news.title: Job cuts in October hit highest level for the month in 22 years, Challenger says
news.summary: Job cuts for October totaled 153,074, a 183% surge from September. Job cuts in October totaled 154,000, up from 100,000 in September.

news.title: Peloton recalls 833,000 more bikes over seat post issue, two injuries reported
news.summary: Peloton is again doing a recall after receiving reports that the seat post on its original Bike+ model detached and broke during use, leading to two injuries.

news.title: CarMax stock falls more than 10% as CEO steps down
news.summary: David McCreight, CEO of Lulu's Fashion Lounge Holdings, will serve as interim CEO. CarMax said board member David McCreights, a retail clothing executive, has served as CEO of CarMax's parent company.

news.title: Google's rolling out its most powerful AI chip, taking aim at Nvidia with custom silicon
news.summary: Google says Ironwood, the seventh generation of its Tensor Processing Unit, is more than four times faster than its predecessor chip. Google: Ironwood is the 7th generation of our Tensor processing unit.

news.title: Elon Musk expected to prevail in Tesla shareholder vote over CEO's $1 trillion pay plan
news.summary: Tesla is expected to disclose results of the vote on CEO Elon Musk's pay plan. After Tesla 's annual shareholders meeting on Thursday, the company will disclose results.

news.title: Stablecoin’s promoters want you using it like cash. What could possibly go wrong?
news.summary: Stablecoin could become mainstream digital money — or a risky, leveraged speculation. Stablecoin is a peer-to-peer digital currency that can be used to transfer money.

news.title: Google may be Nvidia’s biggest rival in chips — and now it’s upping its game
news.summary: The company’s seventh-generation TPU chip is custom-built to handle tasks such as large-scale AI model training and high-volume AI inference.

news.title: America is open for AI’s business — China and Europe aren’t even close
news.summary: China's top-down approach and Europe's regulations stifle growth of AI. AI needs market-driven innovation to thrive. China’s top- down approach and European regulations stifled growth.

news.title: After major deleveraging, bitcoin now has ‘significant upside’ and looks more attractive than gold, claims JPMorgan
news.summary: On a volatility-adjusted basis, bitcoin now seems cheaper than gold. Deleveraging in bitcoin futures was responsible for its sheer decline.

news.title: Ray Dalio is back with a fresh warning, and it’s about the Fed’s new policy
news.summary: The legendary investor is warning about the impact of a move at the Fed others might call technical. He says the move could have a negative impact on the economy.
